history.content:
The Queer Alliance Resource Center (QARC) wishes you well. QARC is a student-run LGBTQ+ resource, community, and advocacy center at Cal. We are looking for aspiring trans and queer changemakers and leaders on campus to take part in our internship program. During the program, interns will be paired with QARC Board members and will work on a project that will benefit the LGBTQ+ community. 
This year, we have turned the internship program into a Decal class so students can be compensated for their participation this semester with 2 units and that intern meeting can be at a consistent time. Interns can still be QARC interns if they can't participate in the Decal class. We will have our second infosession on the program on Wednesday, September 2 @ 6:00pm, students can join at that time using this Zoom link. The intern application is due on Friday, Sept. 4 @ 11:59pm and can be found at https://tinyurl.com/QARCinternapp2021. qarcflyer.png
history.subject: QARC Internship Application Open
